definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: This policy brief is an attempt to put concerns relating to potential allergenicity into perspective.
sentences.chinese: 本篇政策摘要將透視對潛在過敏性的擔憂。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the efficacy of anisodamine in the treatment of simplex anaphylactoid purpura.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價山莨菪鹼治療單純型過敏性紫癜的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: I could have gone into Anaphylactic Shock.
sentences.chinese: 我可能會過敏性休克的。

sentences.english: Allergic skin reaction such as urticaria .
sentences.chinese: 過敏性皮膚反應，例如風疹塊。

sentences.english: But benzoyl peroxide dries out skin causing itching or allergic reactions.
sentences.chinese: 但過氧化苯甲酰幹出引起皮膚瘙癢或過敏性反應。

sentences.english: Individual history of hypersensitivity disease in infant asthma has more value than that in the older one.
sentences.chinese: 嬰幼兒個人過敏性疾病史對診斷哮喘較年長兒有價值。

sentences.english: What symptom can irritability rhinitis have?
sentences.chinese: 過敏性鼻炎會有什麼症狀？

sentences.chinese: 鼻子癢，老想打噴嚏，是過敏性鼻炎嗎？
什麼觸發非過敏性鼻炎？

sentences.chinese: 過敏性鼻炎該如何治療？

sentences.chinese: 過敏性紫癜查過敏源是抽血嗎？

sentences.english: We have studied on preventing and treating anaphylactic asthma with Zusanli(S36)point immunotherapy(ZPIT).
sentences.chinese: 用足三裏穴位免疫療法對過敏性哮喘進行防治研究。

sentences.chinese: 過敏性角膜炎上怎麼治療？

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the efficacy of five-medicine therapy in Schonlein-Henoch purpura.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討五聯藥物治療過敏性紫癜的效果。

sentences.english: I remind them to ask me about my allergy to latex.
sentences.chinese: 我提醒他們問我關於我對樹膠有無過敏性的反映。
